sys_template.name: Network Fault - Degraded Performance
sys_template.template:
short_description=[New] Network - Degraded Performance^instructions=Branch codes affected: Site Contact Name: Contact Number[s]: Router IP Address:
Description of fault:
Any recent network issues? Has there been any additional IT equipment installed recently? - Windows 10 Device set up happening! Environmental factors checked? Did anyone logon to or start up a machine when the slowness started? Do users reboot PCs daily? Are there any field based staff on site? Any EUC upgrades ongoing? Virgin NPM checked? (If over utilisation shown, check quantities IT kit on site); PCs (laptops & desktop): iGels: Phones (wired & wireless): OKI printers: MFD printers: Other (PED’s, SIP Ringer, etc…)
Request utilization graph and 2 hours IP accounting when logging fault with third party. Setup Ping Script on WUK1009137 using Bomgar^affected_system=Networks (RPN)^cmdb_ci=^close_notes=^contact_type=phone^impact=2^category=^subcategory=^close_code=
